name: Dino Dash (Alex)
description:
Game Summary

Dino Dash consists of one singular endless runner level. The player can collect power-ups that will allow them to be invincible, gain double the points, and play as their favorite dinosaur.

The game takes place inside a kitchen, primarily on counters, tables, and the floor. The part of the environment of the level that is playable takes place mainly on the Kitchen Island. The Kitchen includes various static and dynamic objects. Static objects are found in the form of Main objects and Clutter, while dynamic objects are listed under Obstacles, Power-ups and Coins.
